segments.text: I see the water just gushing out of the sink, and the woman is completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible how she can ignore such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking those cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get into trouble, but I also hope they don't make a bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at how focused he is on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love the contrast between the calm garden outside and the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like the outside world doesn't even know what's happening in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a play, everything is so dramatic and yet so ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is so fascinating, I can't look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
